Form submissions are configured to be read-only for data integrity reasons. But they are a great candidate for use in [Flows](/admin/settings/flows). Directus Flows is a drag and drop, low-code automation builder to simplify tasks like automatic notifications or sending incoming requests to third party services. Learn more about Flows.
